title: Font ID, please!
content:
Hi everybody!

Does someone know what font this is?  
Thanx in advance!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Font ID, please!.jpg](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=Font%20ID,%20please!.jpg) | 47.21 KB |
author: al_x

comments.content: Youve got Kabel Bold, by Rudolf Koch, c. 1930
Thank you very much, you saved my day!
